original_title: Appeal applications for Grade 6 admission begin today via online
original_body_lines: Based on the 2022 scholarship examination results for Grade 5, the Education Ministry has decided to start calling for appeal applications for Grade 6 for the year 2023 via online as of today.
Accordingly, the applications will be accepted via the online system from noon today (20) till noon on May 8.
Applications can be downloaded from the Education Ministry's official website, https://g6application.moe.gov.lk/#/

Moreover, the ministry said that the document with the school census number related to the school application can be obtained by visiting the website www.moe.gov.lk (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
